class="[--thread-content-max-width:32rem] @[34rem]:[--thread-content-max-width:40rem] @[64rem]:[--thread-content-max-width:48rem] mx-auto max-w-(--thread-content-max-width) flex-1 group/turn-messages up where we left off:

✅ Project: Scandroid FSP Offline Validation App
You’ve built a Flask-based application designed for Financial Service Providers (FSPs) to securely access, sync, and validate beneficiary data offline, based on Kobo registration data and 121 Platform transactions.

🧠 Current Functionality
🔐 FSP Login Flow
FSPs access the /fsp-login page.

Credentials (username/password) are hardcoded in config.py under:

python
Copy
Edit
FSP_USERNAME = "fspadmin"
FSP_PASSWORD = "fspsecure123"
On successful login, they're redirected to /fsp-admin.

🧭 FSP Admin Dashboard
The page /fsp-admin:

Displays a branded, multilingual interface.

Has a "Sync Latest Records" button.

Triggers a backend sync by running offline_sync.py using subprocess.

Displays a user-friendly message such as:

arduino
Copy
Edit
✅ 124 beneficiaries ready for offline validation.
🧹 Logout Function
A Logout button is present on /fsp-admin and redirects users to /fsp-login, clearing the session.

🧰 Offline Cache Functionality (offline_sync.py)
🔄 How Sync Works
Loads config from system_config.json.

Pulls:

Transactions from 121 Platform.

Kobo submissions using _uuid.

For each beneficiary:

Retrieves fields specified in display_config.json.

Encrypts each value using Fernet symmetric encryption.

Downloads and encrypts the beneficiary photo.

📂 File Structure
Offline cache is saved to:

r
Copy
Edit
/offline-cache/payment-{ID}-batch-{#}/
├── photos/
│   ├── {uuid}.enc   &lt;- encrypted photo
└── registrations_cache.json &lt;- encrypted field data
🔐 Encryption Details
A symmetric key (Fernet) is stored in system_config.json as ENCRYPTION_KEY.

All sensitive data (names, phones, etc.) + photo files are encrypted.

Opaque protection: FSPs can’t view the files directly — even if they dig into their device.

🧾 Key Files in Use
Here are the files that have been touched or are part of the current setup:

app.py — the main Flask app handling routes, session, login, and sync

offline_sync.py — downloads + encrypts all cache data and photos

config.py — stores admin/FSP credentials and helpers

system_config.json — stores API credentials, IDs, and the encryption key

display_config.json — defines which fields to cache and which photo field to use

/templates/fsp_login.html — FSP login page

/templates/fsp_admin.html — Admin dashboard

/static/ — Contains logos and the Scandroid banner

🗓️ Next Steps for Monday
You can simply say:

"Hi, can you pick up from where we left off with the Scandroid FSP app? Here's my app.py."

That will be enough context to continue. I’ll ask for any missing files (like system_config.json, etc.) if needed.

Let me know Monday morning what you’d like to do next — e.g., rendering encrypted images, decrypting on frontend, adding audit logging, or making it production-ready.

Have a well-earned weekend.

    html, body {
      height: 100%;
      margin: 0;
    }

    body {
      font-family: Arial, sans-serif;
      background-color: #f8f9fa;
      display: flex;
      flex-direction: column;
    }

    .page-wrapper {
      flex: 1;
      display: flex;
      flex-direction: column;
      justify-content: center;
      align-items: center;
      position: relative;
    }

    .branding {
      text-align: center;
      margin-bottom: 30px;
    }

    .branding img {
      height: 300px;
      margin-bottom: 10px;
    }

    .branding h1 {
      margin: 0;
    }

    .branding p {
      margin: 0;
      font-style: italic;
      color: #666;
    }

    .login-box {
      background: white;
      padding: 30px;
      border-radius: 10px;
      box-shadow: 0 0 10px #ccc;
      width: 300px;
    }

    .login-box h2 {
      text-align: center;
    }

    .login-box input[type="text"],
    .login-box input[type="password"] {
      width: 100%;
      padding: 10px;
      margin-top: 10px;
      margin-bottom: 20px;
    }

    .login-box button {
      width: 100%;
      padding: 10px;
      font-size: 16px;
      background-color: #007bff;
      color: white;
      border: none;
      border-radius: 6px;
    }

    .error {
      color: red;
      text-align: center;
      margin-bottom: 10px;
    }

    .lang-selector {
      position: absolute;
      top: 20px;
      right: 20px;
    }

    footer {
      background-color: #f1f1f1;
      color: #666;
      padding: 15px 30px;
      font-size: 14px;
      display: flex;
      justify-content: space-between;
      width: 100%;
      box-sizing: border-box;
    }

  &lt;style&gt;
    html, body {
      height: 100%;
      margin: 0;
    }

    body {
      font-family: Arial, sans-serif;
      background: #f8f9fa;
    }

    .page-wrapper {
      min-height: 100%;
      display: flex;
      flex-direction: column;
    }

    .back-button {
      position: absolute;
      top: 20px;
      left: 20px;
    }

    .back-button a {
      text-decoration: none;
      background-color: #007bff;
      color: white;
      padding: 8px 14px;
      border-radius: 6px;
      font-size: 14px;
    }

      position: absolute;
      top: 20px;
      right: 20px;
    }

    .logo-container {
      text-align: center;
      margin-top: 60px;
      margin-bottom: 20px;
    }

    .logo-container img {
      height: 60px;
      margin: 0 10px;
    }

    .config-container {
      flex: 1;
      padding: 0 40px 100px 40px;
    }

    h1 {
      text-align: center;
      margin-bottom: 30px;
    }

    table {
      width: 100%;
      border-collapse: collapse;
      margin-bottom: 20px;
      background: white;
      box-shadow: 0 0 10px #ccc;
    }

    th, td {
      border: 1px solid #aaa;
      padding: 8px;
      text-align: left;
    }

    input[type="text"] {
      width: 100%;
      padding: 8px;
    }

      padding: 10px 20px;
      font-size: 16px;
      margin-right: 10px;
      cursor: pointer;
    }

    }

  &lt;script&gt;
    // Add a field row
    function addRowFromData(item = { key: '', labels: { en: '', fr: '', ar: '' } }) {
      const row = document.createElement('tr');
      row.innerHTML = <code>
</code>        &lt;td&gt;&lt;input type="text" name="key" value="${item.key || ''}"&gt;&lt;/td&gt;
        &lt;td&gt;&lt;input type="text" name="label_en" value="${item.labels.en || ''}"&gt;&lt;/td&gt;
        &lt;td&gt;&lt;input type="text" name="label_fr" value="${item.labels.fr || ''}"&gt;&lt;/td&gt;
        &lt;td&gt;&lt;input type="text" name="label_ar" value="${item.labels.ar || ''}"&gt;&lt;/td&gt;
        &lt;td&gt;&lt;button type="button" onclick="removeRow(this)"&gt;X&lt;/button&gt;&lt;/td&gt;
      <code>;
</code>      document.querySelector('#fieldTable tbody').appendChild(row);
    }

    function addRow() {
      addRowFromData();
    }

    function removeRow(button) {
      button.closest('tr').remove();
    }

    async function loadConfig() {
      const config = {{ config|tojson }};
      if (config.fields) {
        config.fields.forEach(addRowFromData);
      }

      if (config.photo) {
        document.getElementById('photoEnabled').checked = config.photo.enabled;
        document.getElementById('photoKey').value = config.photo.field_name || 'photo';
        document.getElementById('photoLabelEn').value = config.photo.labels.en || '';
        document.getElementById('photoLabelFr').value = config.photo.labels.fr || '';
        document.getElementById('photoLabelAr').value = config.photo.labels.ar || '';
      }
    }

    document.getElementById('configForm').addEventListener('submit', async function (e) {
      e.preventDefault();
      const rows = document.querySelectorAll('#fieldTable tbody tr');
      const fields = Array.from(rows).map(row =&gt; {
        const inputs = row.querySelectorAll('input');
        return {
          key: inputs[0].value,
          labels: {
            en: inputs[1].value,
            fr: inputs[2].value,
            ar: inputs[3].value
          }
        };
      });

      const photoConfig = {
        enabled: document.getElementById('photoEnabled').checked,
        field_name: document.getElementById('photoKey').value,
        labels: {
          en: document.getElementById('photoLabelEn').value,
          fr: document.getElementById('photoLabelFr').value,
          ar: document.getElementById('photoLabelAr').value
        }
      };

      const result = {
        fields: fields,
        photo: photoConfig
      };

      const res = await fetch('/config', {
        method: 'POST',
        headers: { 'Content-Type': 'application/json' },
        body: JSON.stringify(result)
      });

      if (res.ok) {
        alert('{{ t.saved_successfully }}');
      } else {
        alert('{{ t.failed_to_save }}');
      }
    });

    window.onload = loadConfig;
  &lt;/script&gt;
&lt;/body&gt;
&lt;/html&gt;

&lt;script&gt;
  document.getElementById("syncBtn").addEventListener("click", function () {
    const btn = this;
    const statusDiv = document.getElementById("statusMessage");
    btn.disabled = true;
    btn.innerText = "{{ t.syncing or 'Syncing...' }}";

    fetch("/sync-fsp?lang={{ lang }}")
      .then(response =&gt; response.json())
      .then(data =&gt; {
        if (data.success) {
          statusDiv.textContent = data.message;
        } else {
          statusDiv.textContent = data.message;
        }
        btn.disabled = false;
        btn.innerText = "{{ t.sync_latest or 'Sync Latest Records' }}";
      })
      .catch(err =&gt; {
        statusDiv.textContent = "{{ t.sync_error or '❌ Failed to sync. Please try again.' }}";
        btn.disabled = false;
        btn.innerText = "{{ t.sync_latest or 'Sync Latest Records' }}";
      });
  });
&lt;/script&gt;

&lt;/body&gt;
&lt;/html&gt;

      &lt;div class="column"&gt;
        &lt;div class="section-box"&gt;
          &lt;h3&gt;Kobo Information&lt;/h3&gt;
          &lt;label for="KOBO_TOKEN"&gt;Kobo Token&lt;/label&gt;

        &lt;/div&gt;

        &lt;/div&gt;
      &lt;/div&gt;

      &lt;div class="column"&gt;
        &lt;div class="section-box"&gt;
          &lt;h3&gt;121 Information&lt;/h3&gt;
          &lt;label for="url121"&gt;121 URL&lt;/label&gt;
          &lt;input type="text" name="url121" value="{{ config['url121'] }}"&gt;

          &lt;label for="username121"&gt;121 Username&lt;/label&gt;
          &lt;input type="text" name="username121" value="{{ config['username121'] }}"&gt;

          &lt;label for="password121"&gt;121 Password&lt;/label&gt;
          &lt;input type="password" name="password121" value="{{ config['password121'] }}"&gt;

          &lt;label for="programId"&gt;121 Program ID&lt;/label&gt;
          &lt;input type="text" name="programId" value="{{ config['programId'] }}"&gt;

          &lt;label for="PAYMENT_ID"&gt;Payment ID&lt;/label&gt;
          &lt;input type="text" name="PAYMENT_ID" value="{{ config.get('PAYMENT_ID', '') }}"&gt;

          &lt;label for="COLUMN_TO_MATCH"&gt;Field to Match for Payment(e.g., phoneNumber)&lt;/label&gt;
          &lt;input type="text" name="COLUMN_TO_MATCH" value="{{ config.get('COLUMN_TO_MATCH', '') }}"&gt;

        &lt;/div&gt;
      &lt;/div&gt;
    &lt;/main&gt;

class="sr-only">You said:</h5><div class="text-base my-auto mx-auto pt-12 [--thread-content-margin:--spacing(4)] @[37rem]:[--thread-content-margin:--spacing(6)] @[72rem]:[--thread-content-margin:--spacing(16)] px-(--thread-content-margin)"><div class="[--thread-content-max-width:32rem] @[34rem]:[--thread-content-max-width:40rem] @[64rem]:[--thread-content-max-width:48rem] mx-auto max-w-(--thread-content-max-width) flex-1 group/turn-messages focus-visible:outline-hidden relative flex w-full min-w-0 flex-col" tabindex="-1"><div class="flex max-w-full flex-col grow"><div data-message-author-role="user" data-message-id="01ae99aa-9c2b-478e-8715-e7920dac4d35" dir="auto" class="min-h-8 text-message relative flex w-full flex-col items-end gap-2 text-start break-words whitespace-normal [.text-message+&amp;]:mt-5"><div class="flex w-full flex-col gap-1 empty:hidden items-end rtl:items-start"><div class="user-message-bubble-color relative max-w-[var(--user-chat-width,70%)] rounded-[18px] px-4 py-1.5 data-[multiline]:py-3" data-multiline=""><div class="whitespace-pre-wrap">okay, so, I'm thinking that this app has two users essentially - red cross staff - who access the admin pages, and the FSP staff who access fsp admin and beneficiary pages. What I would like is to make the fsp experience a bit more contiguous (not sure if right word) basically. They open app - they sync latest beneficiaries - and then press a button saying scan code - they scan the qr code - beneficiary page appears - approve / submit - then we move to payment successfully saved (let's change so it doesnt say submitted as we submit later)  - then scan next beneficiary - bla bla - until they are done for the day - and then they can go back to the fsp admin page, and it will say 200 beneficiaries ready to submit - so when they have internet they can press push and it all goes to 121. Additionally - i would like this app to work so that on their phone / tablets (Probs android) they can save a link to the page as an icon on their homescreen, open it once, and then be able to use it offline. 

Remember key things: offline usage, data protection, usable for people with low tech proficiency.

Firstly summarise this work flow in a bit of easier way and then lets discuss feasibility</div></div></div></div></div><div class="flex justify-end"><div class="touch:-me-2 touch:-ms-3.5 -ms-2.5 -me-1 focus:outline-none scroll-mt-[calc(var(--header-height)+min(200px,max(70px,20svh)))]" tabindex="-1" dir="auto" data-turn-id="d2545735-21f5-435a-b7d0-e7fa46a62232" data-testid="conversation-turn-8" data-scroll-anchor="false" data-turn="assistant" style=""><h6 class="sr-only">ChatGPT said:</h6><div class="text-base my-auto mx-auto [--thread-content-margin:--spacing(4)] @[37rem]:[--thread-content-margin:--spacing(6)] @[72rem]:[--thread-content-margin:--spacing(16)] px-(--thread-content-margin)"><div class="[--thread-content-max-width:32rem] @[34rem]:[--thread-content-max-width:40rem] @[64rem]:[--thread-content-max-width:48rem] mx-auto max-w-(--thread-content-max-width) flex-1 group/turn-messages focus-visible:outline-hidden relative flex w-full min-w-0 flex-col agent-turn" tabindex="-1"><div class="flex max-w-full flex-col grow"><div class="absolute flex h-8 w-3 origin-center items-center justify-center" style="opacity: 0; transform: scale(0);"><div class="bg-token-text-primary h-3 w-3 rounded-full"></div></div><div class="relative my-1 min-h-6"><div class="relative flex max-w-[calc(0.8*var(--thread-content-max-width,40rem))] origin-top-left flex-col gap-2 overflow-x-clip" style="opacity: 1; transform: none;"><span class="" data-state="closed"><div class="relative w-full text-start"><div class="flex w-full items-start justify-between text-start flex-col"><button class="flex w-full items-center gap-0.5"><span class=""><span class="flex items-center gap-1 text-start align-middle truncate text-token-text-secondary hover:text-token-text-primary" style="opacity: 1;">Thought for 7s</span></span></button></div></div></span></div></div><div data-message-author-role="assistant" data-message-id="02fab0c8-95fb-4cb2-ac13-296df83f192f" dir="auto" class="min-h-8 text-message relative flex w-full flex-col items-end gap-2 text-start break-words whitespace-normal [.text-message+&amp;]:mt-5" data-message-model-slug="gpt-5-thinking"><div class="flex w-full flex-col gap-1 empty:hidden first:pt-[3px]"><div class="markdown prose dark:prose-invert w-full break-words light markdown-new-styling"><p data-start="0" data-end="33">Here’s your FSP flow, simplified:</p>
<ol data-start="35" data-end="619">
<li data-start="35" data-end="84">
<p data-start="38" data-end="84">Open the app → land on the FSP admin screen.</p>
</li>
<li data-start="85" data-end="164">
<p data-start="88" data-end="164">Tap “Sync latest beneficiaries” (while online) → offline cache is updated.</p>
</li>
<li data-start="165" data-end="214">
<p data-start="168" data-end="214">Tap “Scan code” → scan the beneficiary’s QR.</p>
</li>
<li data-start="215" data-end="303">
<p data-start="218" data-end="303">Beneficiary page opens (from the offline cache) → FSP taps “Approve” (or “Reject”).</p>
</li>
<li data-start="304" data-end="399">
<p data-start="307" data-end="399">Show “Payment successfully saved” (locally queued) + a big “Scan next beneficiary” button.</p>
</li>
<li data-start="400" data-end="447">
<p data-start="403" data-end="447">Repeat steps 3–5 for everyone in the line.</p>
</li>
<li data-start="448" data-end="534">
<p data-start="451" data-end="534">Later, back on the FSP admin screen it shows “200 beneficiaries ready to submit.”</p>
</li>
<li data-start="535" data-end="619">
<p data-start="538" data-end="619">When internet is available, tap “Push to 121” → all queued results are submitted.</p>
</li>
</ol>
<p data-start="621" data-end="650">Feasibility (short + honest):</p>
<ul data-start="652" data-end="1872">
<li data-start="652" data-end="880">
<p data-start="654" data-end="880">Offline-first use: Yes. Turn the app into a PWA (manifest + service worker) so Android users can “Add to Home screen” and run it offline after the first load. Cache the UI + JS/CSS assets and the encrypted beneficiary batch.</p>
</li>
<li data-start="881" data-end="1013">
<p data-start="883" data-end="1013">QR scanning offline: Yes in Android Chrome via the browser camera (getUserMedia) and a JS QR library; works offline once cached.</p>
</li>
<li data-start="1014" data-end="1345">
<p data-start="1016" data-end="1345">Data at rest: You already encrypt cached fields + photos with Fernet. For offline beneficiary pages, the browser will need a way to decrypt on-device to render names/photo. That means the symmetric key must be available on-device (trade-off: practical for field ops, but not the same protection as keeping the key server-side).</p>
</li>
<li data-start="1346" data-end="1508">
<p data-start="1348" data-end="1508">Approvals queue: Store approvals/rejections locally (e.g., IndexedDB). When online, POST the reconciliation to 121 in one go from the FSP admin “Push” action.</p>
</li>
<li data-start="1509" data-end="1683">
<p data-start="1511" data-end="1683">Low-tech usability: This flow keeps actions linear: Sync → Scan → Approve → Scan next → Push later. Big buttons, one primary path, and clear counts (“X ready to submit”).</p>
</li>
<li data-start="1684" data-end="1872">
<p data-start="1686" data-end="1872">Platforms/constraints: Works best on Android/Chrome. Requires HTTPS for camera access and PWA install. Background sync is nice-to-have but not required; a manual “Push” button is enough.</p>
</li>
</ul>
<p data-start="1874" data-end="2161" data-is-last-node="" data-is-only-node="">In short: the end-to-end you described is doable with your current architecture plus PWA packaging, an on-device queue, and client-side decryption to render the cached records offline. If you’re happy with that trade-off on the encryption key being present on the device, we can proceed.</p></div></div></div></div><div class="flex min-h-[46px] justify-start"><div class="touch:-me-2 touch:-ms-3.5 -ms-2.5 -me-1 flex flex-wrap items-center gap-y-4 p-1 select-none touch:w-[calc(100%+--spacing(3.5))] -mt-1 w-[calc(100%+--spacing(2.5))] duration-[1.5s] focus-within:transition-none hover:transition-none pointer-events-none [mask-image:linear-gradient(to_right,black_33%,transparent_66%)] [mask-size:300%_100%] [mask-position:100%_0%] motion-safe:transition-[mask-position] focus:outline-none scroll-mt-[calc(var(--header-height)+min(200px,max(70px,20svh)))]" tabindex="-1" dir="auto" data-turn-id="66a2f1d8-86a8-4301-9a52-613e42c81a9e" data-testid="conversation-turn-10" data-scroll-anchor="false" data-turn="assistant" style=""><h6 class="sr-only">ChatGPT said:</h6><div class="text-base my-auto mx-auto [--thread-content-margin:--spacing(4)] @[37rem]:[--thread-content-margin:--spacing(6)] @[72rem]:[--thread-content-margin:--spacing(16)] px-(--thread-content-margin)"><div class="[--thread-content-max-width:32rem] @[34rem]:[--thread-content-max-width:40rem] @[64rem]:[--thread-content-max-width:48rem] mx-auto max-w-(--thread-content-max-width) flex-1 group/turn-messages focus-visible:outline-hidden relative flex w-full min-w-0 flex-col agent-turn" tabindex="-1"><div class="flex max-w-full flex-col grow"><div class="absolute flex h-8 w-3 origin-center items-center justify-center" style="opacity: 0; transform: scale(0);"><div class="bg-token-text-primary h-3 w-3 rounded-full"></div></div><div class="relative my-1 min-h-6"><div class="relative flex max-w-[calc(0.8*var(--thread-content-max-width,40rem))] origin-top-left flex-col gap-2 overflow-x-clip" style="opacity: 1; transform: none;"><span class="" data-state="closed"><div class="relative w-full text-start"><div class="flex w-full items-start justify-between text-start flex-col"><button class="flex w-full items-center gap-0.5"><span class=""><span class="flex items-center gap-1 text-start align-middle truncate text-token-text-secondary hover:text-token-text-primary" style="opacity: 1;">Thought for 5s</span></span></button></div></div></span></div></div><div data-message-author-role="assistant" data-message-id="26a210d5-3078-428e-8921-122adc6bba58" dir="auto" class="min-h-8 text-message relative flex w-full flex-col items-end gap-2 text-start break-words whitespace-normal [.text-message+&amp;]:mt-5" data-message-model-slug="gpt-5-thinking"><div class="flex w-full flex-col gap-1 empty:hidden first:pt-[3px]"><div class="markdown prose dark:prose-invert w-full break-words light markdown-new-styling"><p data-start="0" data-end="45">Totally fine—and it does make things simpler.</p>
<p data-start="47" data-end="102">Here’s the overwrite behavior and how we’ll wire it in:</p>
<h1 data-start="104" data-end="138">What “overwrite on rescan” means</h1>
<ul data-start="139" data-end="585">
<li data-start="139" data-end="194">
<p data-start="141" data-end="194">Each beneficiary is identified by their Kobo <code data-start="186" data-end="193">_uuid</code>.</p>
</li>
<li data-start="195" data-end="264">
<p data-start="197" data-end="264">When the QR is scanned, we open that record from the offline cache.</p>
</li>
<li data-start="265" data-end="467">
<p data-start="267" data-end="352">If a decision (approve/reject + optional reason) already exists for that <code data-start="340" data-end="347">_uuid</code>, we:</p>
<ul data-start="355" data-end="467">
<li data-start="355" data-end="415">
<p data-start="357" data-end="415">show it on the page (so the FSP sees what was last saved),</p>
</li>
<li data-start="418" data-end="467">
<p data-start="420" data-end="467">and any new action simply replaces the old one.</p>
</li>
</ul>
</li>
<li data-start="468" data-end="585">
<p data-start="470" data-end="585">The “ready to submit” count always reflects the <strong data-start="518" data-end="566">number of unique UUIDs with a saved decision</strong> (not total scans).</p>
</li>
</ul>
<h1 data-start="587" data-end="616">Minimal implementation plan</h1>
<ul data-start="617" data-end="1895">
<li data-start="617" data-end="822">
<p data-start="619" data-end="682"><strong data-start="619" data-end="647">Local queue (IndexedDB):</strong> one object store keyed by <code data-start="674" data-end="681">_uuid</code>.</p>
<ul data-start="685" data-end="822">
<li data-start="685" data-end="777">
<p data-start="687" data-end="777">Value shape: <code data-start="700" data-end="777">{ uuid, status: 'approved'|'rejected', reason: string, decidedAt: ISO8601 }</code></p>
</li>
<li data-start="780" data-end="822">
<p data-start="782" data-end="822">Upsert on every save → overwrite by key.</p>
</li>
</ul>
</li>
<li data-start="823" data-end="1091">
<p data-start="825" data-end="846"><strong data-start="825" data-end="846">Beneficiary page:</strong></p>
<ul data-start="849" data-end="1091">
<li data-start="849" data-end="956">
<p data-start="851" data-end="956">On load, read IndexedDB by <code data-start="878" data-end="884">uuid</code>. If found, pre-fill status/reason and show “Previously saved at HH:MM”.</p>
</li>
<li data-start="959" data-end="1014">
<p data-start="961" data-end="1014">On Approve/Reject → <code data-start="981" data-end="988">put()</code> to IndexedDB (overwrite).</p>
</li>
<li data-start="1017" data-end="1091">
<p data-start="1019" data-end="1091">After save, show “Payment successfully saved” + “Scan next beneficiary”.</p>
</li>
</ul>
</li>
<li data-start="1092" data-end="1491">
<p data-start="1094" data-end="1115"><strong data-start="1094" data-end="1115">FSP Admin screen:</strong></p>
<ul data-start="1118" data-end="1491">
<li data-start="1118" data-end="1186">
<p data-start="1120" data-end="1186">On load, read IndexedDB count → “X beneficiaries ready to submit”.</p>
</li>
<li data-start="1189" data-end="1491">
<p data-start="1191" data-end="1212">“Push to 121” button:</p>
<ul data-start="1217" data-end="1491">
<li data-start="1217" data-end="1251">
<p data-start="1219" data-end="1251">Reads all values from IndexedDB,</p>
</li>
<li data-start="1256" data-end="1336">
<p data-start="1258" data-end="1336">Sends one POST to a new backend endpoint (e.g., <code data-start="1306" data-end="1319">/push-queue</code>) with the array.</p>
</li>
<li data-start="1341" data-end="1413">
<p data-start="1343" data-end="1413">Backend transforms to the reconciliation format(s) and uploads to 121.</p>
</li>
<li data-start="1418" data-end="1491">
<p data-start="1420" data-end="1491">On success, clears the local queue (or only those successfully pushed).</p>
</li>
</ul>
</li>
</ul>
</li>
<li data-start="1492" data-end="1589">
<p data-start="1494" data-end="1589"><strong data-start="1494" data-end="1515">Deduping on push:</strong> built-in via the UUID key—only the latest decision per UUID is ever sent.</p>
</li>
<li data-start="1590" data-end="1895">
<p data-start="1592" data-end="1607"><strong data-start="1592" data-end="1607">Edge cases:</strong></p>
<ul data-start="1610" data-end="1895">
<li data-start="1610" data-end="1668">
<p data-start="1612" data-end="1668">If an FSP rescans and flips a decision, latest one wins.</p>
</li>
<li data-start="1671" data-end="1764">
<p data-start="1673" data-end="1764">If push fails mid-way, backend returns which UUIDs succeeded; we only delete those locally.</p>
</li>
<li data-start="1767" data-end="1895">
<p data-start="1769" data-end="1895">If a beneficiary was already submitted on 121, backend can skip and report back; we keep or drop locally based on your policy.</p>
</li>
</ul>
</li>
</ul>
<p data-start="1897" data-end="1934">If you’re happy with that, I can add:</p>
<ol data-start="1935" data-end="2171" data-is-last-node="" data-is-only-node="">
<li data-start="1935" data-end="2008">
<p data-start="1938" data-end="2008">the small IndexedDB layer (tiny helper with <code data-start="1982" data-end="2004">get/put/getAll/clear</code>),</p>
</li>
<li data-start="2009" data-end="2073">
<p data-start="2012" data-end="2073">the front-end calls from beneficiary + FSP admin pages, and</p>
</li>
<li data-start="2074" data-end="2171" data-is-last-node="">
<p data-start="2077" data-end="2171" data-is-last-node="">a <code data-start="2079" data-end="2092">/push-queue</code> Flask endpoint that accepts an array and performs the 121 reconciliation loop.</p>
</li>
</ol></div></div></div></div><div class="flex min-h-[46px] justify-start"><div class="touch:-me-2 touch:-ms-3.5 -ms-2.5 -me-1 flex flex-wrap items-center gap-y-4 p-1 select-none I’ve grouped it so each step is small, testable, and tied to specific files/routes.</p>
<h1 data-start="144" data-end="180">Phase 1 — Flow wiring (no PWA yet)</h1>
<ol data-start="181" data-end="1299">
<li data-start="181" data-end="350">
<p data-start="184" data-end="228">Add a “Scan code” entry point on FSP Admin</p>
<ul data-start="232" data-end="350">
<li data-start="232" data-end="273">
<p data-start="234" data-end="273"><strong data-start="234" data-end="244">Files:</strong> <code data-start="245" data-end="271">templates/fsp_admin.html</code></p>
</li>
<li data-start="277" data-end="350">
<p data-start="279" data-end="350"><strong data-start="279" data-end="293">Done when:</strong> There’s a big “Scan code” button that routes to <code data-start="342" data-end="349">/scan</code>.</p>
</li>
</ul>
</li>
<li data-start="352" data-end="584">
<p data-start="355" data-end="393">Create <code data-start="362" data-end="369">/scan</code> page with QR scanning</p>
<ul data-start="397" data-end="584">
<li data-start="397" data-end="474">
<p data-start="399" data-end="474"><strong data-start="399" data-end="409">Files:</strong> <code data-start="410" data-end="418">app.py</code>, <code data-start="420" data-end="441">templates/scan.html</code> (new), <code data-start="449" data-end="466">static/js/qr.js</code> (new)</p>
</li>
<li data-start="478" data-end="584">
<p data-start="480" data-end="584"><strong data-start="480" data-end="494">Done when:</strong> Scanning a QR with a valid <code data-start="522" data-end="529">_uuid</code> (or internal ID) opens <code data-start="553" data-end="583">/beneficiary?id=...&amp;lang=...</code>.</p>
</li>
</ul>
</li>
<li data-start="586" data-end="775">
<p data-start="589" data-end="610">Change success copy</p>
<ul data-start="614" data-end="775">
<li data-start="614" data-end="653">
<p data-start="616" data-end="653"><strong data-start="616" data-end="626">Files:</strong> <code data-start="627" data-end="651">templates/success.html</code></p>
</li>
<li data-start="657" data-end="775">
<p data-start="659" data-end="775"><strong data-start="659" data-end="673">Done when:</strong> It reads “Payment successfully saved” and shows a big “Scan next beneficiary” button back to <code data-start="767" data-end="774">/scan</code>.</p>
</li>
</ul>
</li>
<li data-start="777" data-end="1084">
<p data-start="780" data-end="821">Overwrite-on-rescan logic (local queue)</p>
<ul data-start="825" data-end="1084">
<li data-start="825" data-end="901">
<p data-start="827" data-end="901"><strong data-start="827" data-end="837">Files:</strong> <code data-start="838" data-end="866">templates/beneficiary.html</code> (JS), <code data-start="873" data-end="893">static/js/queue.js</code> (new)</p>
</li>
<li data-start="905" data-end="1084">
<p data-start="907" data-end="1084"><strong data-start="907" data-end="921">Done when:</strong> Approve/Reject writes to local queue keyed by <code data-start="968" data-end="974">uuid</code>; rescanning the same person replaces the prior decision. If a saved decision exists, it’s shown on page load.</p>
</li>
</ul>
</li>
<li data-start="1086" data-end="1299">
<p data-start="1089" data-end="1129">“Ready to submit” counter on FSP Admin</p>
<ul data-start="1133" data-end="1299">
<li data-start="1133" data-end="1179">
<p data-start="1135" data-end="1179"><strong data-start="1135" data-end="1145">Files:</strong> <code data-start="1146" data-end="1172">templates/fsp_admin.html</code> (JS)</p>
</li>
<li data-start="1183" data-end="1299">
<p data-start="1185" data-end="1299"><strong data-start="1185" data-end="1199">Done when:</strong> Page reads queue count from local storage/IndexedDB and displays “X beneficiaries ready to submit.”</p>
</li>
</ul>
</li>
</ol>
<h1 data-start="1301" data-end="1342">Phase 2 — Offline cache usage on device</h1>
<ol start="6" data-start="1343" data-end="1913">
<li data-start="1343" data-end="1627">
<p data-start="1346" data-end="1402">Load beneficiary data from offline cache (client-side)</p>
<ul data-start="1406" data-end="1627">
<li data-start="1406" data-end="1482">
<p data-start="1408" data-end="1482"><strong data-start="1408" data-end="1418">Files:</strong> <code data-start="1419" data-end="1447">templates/beneficiary.html</code> (JS), <code data-start="1454" data-end="1474">static/js/cache.js</code> (new)</p>
</li>
<li data-start="1486" data-end="1627">
<p data-start="1488" data-end="1627"><strong data-start="1488" data-end="1502">Done when:</strong> Page renders the requested beneficiary strictly from the local encrypted batch (no network). Missing record → clear message.</p>
</li>
</ul>
</li>
<li data-start="1629" data-end="1913">
<p data-start="1632" data-end="1668">Client-side decryption for display</p>
<ul data-start="1672" data-end="1913">
<li data-start="1672" data-end="1749">
<p data-start="1674" data-end="1749"><strong data-start="1674" data-end="1684">Files:</strong> <code data-start="1685" data-end="1713">templates/beneficiary.html</code> (JS), <code data-start="1720" data-end="1741">static/js/crypto.js</code> (new)</p>
</li>
<li data-start="1753" data-end="1913">
<p data-start="1755" data-end="1913"><strong data-start="1755" data-end="1769">Done when:</strong> Fields/photos from <code data-start="1789" data-end="1804">offline-cache</code> decrypt and display. (Uses Fernet key available on device; we’ll wire the safest pass-through we agreed on.)</p>
</li>
</ul>
</li>
</ol>
<h1 data-start="1915" data-end="1938">Phase 3 — Push to 121</h1>
<ol start="8" data-start="1939" data-end="2437">
<li data-start="1939" data-end="2171">
<p data-start="1942" data-end="1991">New backend endpoint to accept queued decisions</p>
<ul data-start="1995" data-end="2171">
<li data-start="1995" data-end="2039">
<p data-start="1997" data-end="2039"><strong data-start="1997" data-end="2007">Files:</strong> <code data-start="2008" data-end="2016">app.py</code> (<code data-start="2018" data-end="2031">/push-queue</code> POST)</p>
</li>
<li data-start="2043" data-end="2171">
<p data-start="2045" data-end="2171"><strong data-start="2045" data-end="2059">Done when:</strong> Endpoint accepts an array of <code data-start="2089" data-end="2115">{ uuid, status, reason }</code> and transforms to reconciliation upload(s) against 121.</p>
</li>
</ul>
</li>
<li data-start="2173" data-end="2398">
<p data-start="2176" data-end="2200">Frontend “Push to 121”</p>
<ul data-start="2204" data-end="2398">
<li data-start="2204" data-end="2250">
<p data-start="2206" data-end="2250"><strong data-start="2206" data-end="2216">Files:</strong> <code data-start="2217" data-end="2243">templates/fsp_admin.html</code> (JS)</p>
</li>
<li data-start="2254" data-end="2398">
<p data-start="2256" data-end="2398"><strong data-start="2256" data-end="2270">Done when:</strong> Clicking “Push” posts the queue, shows progress/success count, and removes only successfully pushed items from the local queue.</p>
</li>
</ul>
</li>
<li data-start="2400" data-end="2437">
<p data-start="2404" data-end="2437">Duplicate/late changes handling</p>
</li>
</ol>
<ul data-start="2441" data-end="2668">
<li data-start="2441" data-end="2516">
<p data-start="2443" data-end="2516"><strong data-start="2443" data-end="2453">Files:</strong> <code data-start="2454" data-end="2462">app.py</code> (response details), <code data-start="2483" data-end="2509">templates/fsp_admin.html</code> (JS)</p>
</li>
<li data-start="2520" data-end="2668">
<p data-start="2522" data-end="2668"><strong data-start="2522" data-end="2536">Done when:</strong> If some UUIDs fail (e.g., already processed in 121), UI shows a short summary; successful ones are cleared, failures remain queued.</p>
</li>
</ul>
<h1 data-start="2670" data-end="2709">Phase 4 — PWA (installable + offline)</h1>
<ol start="11" data-start="2710" data-end="2736">
<li data-start="2710" data-end="2736">
<p data-start="2714" data-end="2736">Add web app manifest</p>
</li>
</ol>
<ul data-start="2740" data-end="2901">
<li data-start="2740" data-end="2811">
<p data-start="2742" data-end="2811"><strong data-start="2742" data-end="2752">Files:</strong> <code data-start="2753" data-end="2775">static/manifest.json</code> (new), link tag in base templates</p>
</li>
<li data-start="2815" data-end="2901">
<p data-start="2817" data-end="2901"><strong data-start="2817" data-end="2831">Done when:</strong> App is installable on Android (“Add to Home screen”), with name/icon.</p>
</li>
</ul>
<ol start="12" data-start="2903" data-end="2942">
<li data-start="2903" data-end="2942">
<p data-start="2907" data-end="2942">Service worker + caching strategy</p>
</li>
</ol>
<ul data-start="2946" data-end="3254">
<li data-start="2946" data-end="3030">
<p data-start="2948" data-end="3030"><strong data-start="2948" data-end="2958">Files:</strong> <code data-start="2959" data-end="2973">static/sw.js</code> (new), <code data-start="2981" data-end="2989">app.py</code> route to serve it with correct headers</p>
</li>
<li data-start="3034" data-end="3134">
<p data-start="3036" data-end="3134"><strong data-start="3036" data-end="3046">Cache:</strong> HTML, CSS, JS, icons, QR lib, and the latest offline batch directory (JSON + photos).</p>
</li>
<li data-start="3138" data-end="3254">
<p data-start="3140" data-end="3254"><strong data-start="3140" data-end="3154">Done when:</strong> After one online visit, the full FSP flow (scan → approve → save → success) works in airplane mode.</p>
</li>
</ul>
<ol start="13" data-start="3256" data-end="3292">
<li data-start="3256" data-end="3292">
<p data-start="3260" data-end="3292">HTTPS + camera permission flow</p>
</li>
</ol>
<ul data-start="3296" data-end="3457">
<li data-start="3296" data-end="3330">
<p data-start="3298" data-end="3330"><strong data-start="3298" data-end="3308">Files:</strong> n/a (config/deploy)</p>
</li>
<li data-start="3334" data-end="3457">
<p data-start="3336" data-end="3457"><strong data-start="3336" data-end="3350">Done when:</strong> Scanner works in production origin (required by camera APIs); users can use camera from the installed app.</p>
</li>
</ul>
<h1 data-start="3459" data-end="3489">Phase 5 — Admin-side support</h1>
<ol start="14" data-start="3490" data-end="3549">
<li data-start="3490" data-end="3549">
<p data-start="3494" data-end="3549">Offline batch sync UX polish (text only, no redesign)</p>
</li>
</ol>
<ul data-start="3553" data-end="3709">
<li data-start="3553" data-end="3608">
<p data-start="3555" data-end="3608"><strong data-start="3555" data-end="3565">Files:</strong> <code data-start="3566" data-end="3592">templates/fsp_admin.html</code> (status text)</p>
</li>
<li data-start="3612" data-end="3709">
<p data-start="3614" data-end="3709"><strong data-start="3614" data-end="3628">Done when:</strong> Sync shows a clear line like “✅ 124 beneficiaries ready for offline validation.”</p>
</li>
</ul>
<ol start="15" data-start="3711" data-end="3738">
<li data-start="3711" data-end="3738">
<p data-start="3715" data-end="3738">Log &amp; audit (minimal)</p>
</li>
</ol>
<ul data-start="3742" data-end="3908">
<li data-start="3742" data-end="3819">
<p data-start="3744" data-end="3819"><strong data-start="3744" data-end="3754">Files:</strong> <code data-start="3755" data-end="3763">app.py</code> (append to <code data-start="3775" data-end="3799">reconciliation_log.csv</code> is already there)</p>
</li>
<li data-start="3823" data-end="3908">
<p data-start="3825" data-end="3908"><strong data-start="3825" data-end="3839">Done when:</strong> Pushed decisions append an entry (time, uuid, status, success/fail).</p>
</li>
</ul>
<h1 data-start="3910" data-end="3937">Phase 6 — Test &amp; handover</h1>
<ol start="16" data-start="3938" data-end="3969">
<li data-start="3938" data-end="3969">
<p data-start="3942" data-end="3969">Structured test checklist</p>
</li>
</ol>
<ul data-start="3973" data-end="4260">
<li data-start="3973" data-end="4048">
<p data-start="3975" data-end="4048"><strong data-start="3975" data-end="3986">Online:</strong> Sync → Scan → Approve → Scan next → Push → Confirm cleared.</p>
</li>
<li data-start="4052" data-end="4169">
<p data-start="4054" data-end="4169"><strong data-start="4054" data-end="4066">Offline:</strong> Open from home-screen → Scan → Approve → Scan next → Counter increments → Later online → Push works.</p>
</li>
<li data-start="4173" data-end="4260">
<p data-start="4175" data-end="4260"><strong data-start="4175" data-end="4189">Overwrite:</strong> Approve, then rescan and Reject → latest decision is what gets pushed.</p>
</li>
</ul>
<ol start="17" data-start="4262" data-end="4297">
<li data-start="4262" data-end="4297">
<p data-start="4266" data-end="4297">Minimal docs (README section)</p>
</li>
</ol>
<ul data-start="4301" data-end="4442">
<li data-start="4301" data-end="4327">
<p data-start="4303" data-end="4327"><strong data-start="4303" data-end="4313">Files:</strong> <code data-start="4314" data-end="4325">README.md</code></p>
</li>
<li data-start="4331" data-end="4442">
<p data-start="4333" data-end="4442"><strong data-start="4333" data-end="4347">Done when:</strong> One page with: first-run steps, how to sync, scan, push, and what “overwrite on rescan” means.</p>
</li>
</ul>

</span></span></code></div></div></pre>
<p data-start="364" data-end="455">You can click around, but the QR scanner and PWA install won’t work because it’s not HTTPS.</p>
<h1 data-start="457" data-end="513">Option B: HTTPS tunnel (best overall for camera + PWA)</h1>
<p data-start="514" data-end="602">Gives you a public HTTPS URL that your phone can open—camera + service worker will work.</p>
<ul data-start="604" data-end="832">
<li data-start="604" data-end="678">

4.28711C7.27713 4.3114 7.38267 4.43665 7.38281 4.58301C7.38281 4.7295 7.27723 4.8546 7.13281 4.87891C6.44249 4.99401 5.94116 5.27746 5.58398 5.66211C5.26908 6.00126 5.05404 6.43267 4.92676 class="whitespace-pre!"><span><span><span class="hljs-attribute">cloudflared</span></span><span> tunnel --url http://localhost:5000
</span></span></code></div></div></pre>
<p data-start="804" data-end="832">Use the HTTPS URL it prints.</p>
</li>
</ul>
<p data-start="834" data-end="934">Now open that HTTPS URL on your phone. You can test scanning and install the app to the home screen.</p>
<h1 data-start="936" data-end="993">Option C: USB to phone (neat trick; HTTPS not required)</h1>
<p data-start="994" data-end="1136">If you’re on Android, you can map your laptop’s Flask server to the phone’s <code data-start="1070" data-end="1081">localhost</code>, which counts as a “secure context” for camera access.</p>
<ol data-start="1138" data-end="1382">
<li data-start="1138" data-end="1195">
<p data-start="1141" data-end="1195">Enable Developer Options + USB debugging on the phone.</p>
</li>
<li data-start="1196" data-end="1303">

</span></span></code></div></div></pre>
</li>
</ol>
<p data-start="1383" data-end="1511">Camera access should work here, and you can test scanning. (PWA install may still be limited without HTTPS, but scanning works.)</p>
<hr data-start="1513" data-end="1516">
<p data-start="1518" data-end="1529">Quick pick:</p>
<ul data-start="1530" data-end="1729" data-is-last-node="" data-is-only-node="">
<li data-start="1530" data-end="1600">
<p data-start="1532" data-end="1600">Want the fastest end-to-end (including QR + PWA)? Option B (tunnel).</p>

<li data-start="1601" data-end="1654">
<p data-start="1603" data-end="1654">Want zero setup just to click through UI? Option A.</p>

@[37rem]:[--thread-content-margin:--spacing(6)] @[72rem]:[--thread-content-margin:--spacing(16)] px-(--thread-content-margin)"><div class="[--thread-content-max-width:32rem] @[34rem]:[--thread-content-max-width:40rem] @[64rem]:[--thread-content-max-width:48rem] mx-auto max-w-(--thread-content-max-width) flex-1 group/turn-messages focus-visible:outline-hidden relative flex flex-col gap-1 empty:hidden first:pt-[3px]"><div class="markdown prose dark:prose-invert w-full break-words light markdown-new-styling"><p data-start="0" data-end="127">That error just means Windows doesn’t know where <code data-start="49" data-end="56">flask</code> is because it’s installed in your virtual environment, not globally.</p>
<p data-start="129" data-end="161">You have two ways to fix this:</p>
<hr data-start="163" data-end="166">
<p data-start="168" data-end="250"><strong data-start="168" data-end="222">Option 1 — Activate your virtual environment first</strong><br data-start="222" data-end="225">
From your project folder:</p>
<pre class="overflow-visible!" data-start="251" data-end="377"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-2xl relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary"><div class="flex items-center <hr data-start="471" data-end="474">
<p data-start="476" data-end="592"><strong data-start="476" data-end="519">Option 2 — Always use <code data-start="500" data-end="517">python -m flask</code></strong><br data-start="519" data-end="522">
That way, you don’t need to rely on the <code data-start="562" data-end="569">flask</code> command being in PATH:</p>
<pre class="overflow-visible!" data-start="593" data-end="657"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-2xl relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary"><div class="flex items-center language-html"><span><span><span class="hljs-tag">&lt;<span class="hljs-name">meta</span></span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-attr">name</span></span><span>=</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"viewport"</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-attr">content</span></span><span>=</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"width=device-width, initial-scale=1, viewport-fit=cover"</span></span><span>&gt;
</span></span></code></div></div></pre>
<ol start="2" data-start="338" data-end="996">
<li data-start="338" data-end="461">
<p data-start="341" data-end="461">Make buttons/tap targets mobile-safe<br data-start="377" data-end="380">
Ensure primary buttons are at least 44–48px high and full-width on small screens.</p>
</li>
<li data-start="463" data-end="570">
<p data-start="466" data-end="570">Stack header items on small screens<br data-start="501" data-end="504">
Logos → banner → language/logout should wrap instead of squeezing.</p>
</li>
<li data-start="572" data-end="671">
<p data-start="575" data-end="671">Reduce big banner heights on small screens<br data-start="617" data-end="620">
Cap images with <code data-start="636" data-end="648">max-height</code> and <code data-start="653" data-end="670">max-width: 100%</code>.</p>
</li>
<li data-start="673" data-end="772">
<p data-start="676" data-end="772">Avoid fixed/absolute footers<br data-start="704" data-end="707">
They overlap content on small viewports. Let them flow naturally.</p>
</li>
<li data-start="774" data-end="874">
<p data-start="777" data-end="874">Prevent zoom on inputs (iOS quirk, but helps Android too)<br data-start="834" data-end="837">
Use <code data-start="841" data-end="858">font-size: 16px</code> on form inputs.</p>
</li>
<li data-start="876" data-end="996">
<p data-start="879" data-end="996">Use media queries for layout breakpoints<br data-start="919" data-end="922">
At ≤480/576px, switch to column layouts, larger padding, and bigger fonts.</p>
</li>
</ol>
<hr data-start="998" data-end="1001">
<p data-start="1003" data-end="1091">Below are minimal edits you can paste into two key pages to see an immediate difference.</p>
<h2 data-start="1093" data-end="1122">fsp_admin.html (additions)</h2>
<p data-start="1123" data-end="1135">In <code data-start="1126" data-end="1134">&lt;head&gt;</code>:</p>

<h2 data-start="1944" data-end="1971">success.html (additions)</h2>
<p data-start="1972" data-end="1984">In <code data-start="1975" data-end="1983">&lt;head&gt;</code>:</p>
<pre class="overflow-visible!" data-start="1985" data-end="2085"><div class="contain-inline-size rounded-2xl relative bg-token-sidebar-surface-primary"><div class="flex items-center <h2 data-start="2428" data-end="2487">general tweak for pages with absolute/positioned footers</h2>
<p data-start="2488" data-end="2619">In those templates where the footer is <code data-start="2527" data-end="2559">position: absolute; bottom: 0;</code> (e.g., admin dashboard), switch to a normal flowing footer:</p>

    </span><span><span class="hljs-selector-tag">button</span></span><span> { </span><span><span class="hljs-attribute">padding</span></span><span>: </span><span><span class="hljs-number">12px</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-number">16px</span></span><span>; </span><span><span class="hljs-attribute">font-size</span></span><span>: </span><span><span class="hljs-number">16px</span></span><span>; </span><span><span class="hljs-attribute">width</span></span><span>: </span><span><span class="hljs-number">100%</span></span><span>; </span><span><span class="hljs-attribute">min-height</span></span><span>: </span><span><span class="hljs-number">48px</span></span><span>; </span><span><span class="hljs-attribute">border-radius</span></span><span>: </span><span><span class="hljs-number">8px</span></span><span>; }

      </span><span><span class="hljs-tag">&lt;<span class="hljs-name">img</span></span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-attr">src</span></span><span>=</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"/static/redcross-logo.png"</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-attr">alt</span></span><span>=</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"Red Cross"</span></span><span>&gt;
      </span><span><span class="hljs-tag">&lt;<span class="hljs-name">img</span></span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-attr">src</span></span><span>=</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"/static/scandroid-banner.png"</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-attr">alt</span></span><span>=</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"Scandroid"</span></span><span>&gt;
    </span><span><span class="hljs-tag">&lt;/<span class="hljs-name">div</span></span></span><span>&gt;
    </span><span><span class="hljs-tag">&lt;<span class="hljs-name">div</span></span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-attr">class</span></span><span>=</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"right-controls"</span></span><span>&gt;
      </span><span><span class="hljs-tag">&lt;<span class="hljs-name">form</span></span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-attr">action</span></span><span>=</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"/logout"</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-attr">method</span></span><span>=</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"POST"</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-attr">style</span></span><span>=</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"display:inline;"</span></span><span>&gt;
        </span><span><span class="hljs-tag">&lt;<span class="hljs-name">button</span></span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-attr">type</span></span><span>=</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"submit"</span></span><span>&gt;Logout</span><span><span class="hljs-tag">&lt;/<span class="hljs-name">button</span></span></span><span>&gt;
      </span><span><span class="hljs-tag">&lt;/<span class="hljs-name">form</span></span></span><span>&gt;
    </span><span><span class="hljs-tag">&lt;/<span class="hljs-name">div</span></span></span><span>&gt;
  </span><span><span class="hljs-tag">&lt;/<span class="hljs-name">header</span></span></span><span>&gt;
  </span><span><span class="hljs-tag">&lt;<span class="hljs-name">main</span></span></span><span>&gt;
    </span><span><span class="hljs-tag">&lt;<span class="hljs-name">h2</span></span></span><span>&gt;FSP Admin Dashboard</span><span><span class="hljs-tag">&lt;/<span class="hljs-name">h2</span></span></span><span>&gt;
    </span><span><span class="hljs-tag">&lt;<span class="hljs-name">button</span></span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-attr">id</span></span><span>=</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"syncBtn"</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-attr">onclick</span></span><span>=</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"syncRecords()"</span></span><span>&gt;Sync Latest Records</span><span><span class="hljs-tag">&lt;/<span class="hljs-name">button</span></span></span><span>&gt;
    </span><span><span class="hljs-tag">&lt;<span class="hljs-name">div</span></span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-attr">id</span></span><span>=</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"syncStatus"</span></span><span>&gt;No sync performed yet.</span><span><span class="hljs-tag">&lt;/<span class="hljs-name">div</span></span></span><span>&gt;
    </span><span><span class="hljs-tag">&lt;<span class="hljs-name">button</span></span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-attr">onclick</span></span><span>=</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"window.location.href='/scan'"</span></span><span>&gt;Scan Code</span><span><span class="hljs-tag">&lt;/<span class="hljs-name">button</span></span></span><span>&gt;
  </span><span><span class="hljs-tag">&lt;/<span class="hljs-name">main</span></span></span><span>&gt;
  </span><span><span class="hljs-tag">&lt;<span class="hljs-name">footer</span></span></span><span>&gt;
    </span><span><span class="hljs-tag">&lt;<span class="hljs-name">small</span></span></span><span>&gt;</span><span><span class="hljs-symbol">&amp;copy;</span></span><span> 2025 Scandroid</span><span><span class="hljs-tag">&lt;/<span class="hljs-name">small</span></span></span><span>&gt;
  </span><span><span class="hljs-tag">&lt;/<span class="hljs-name">footer</span></span></span><span>&gt;
  </span><span><span class="hljs-tag">&lt;<span class="hljs-name">script</span></span></span><span>&gt;<span class="language-javascript">
    </span></span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">function</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-title function_">syncRecords</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-params"></span></span><span>) {
      </span><span><span class="hljs-title function_">fetch</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">'/fsp-sync'</span></span><span>, { </span><span><span class="hljs-attr">method</span></span><span>: </span><span><span class="hljs-string">'POST'</span></span><span> })
        .</span><span><span class="hljs-title function_">then</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-params">response</span></span></span><span> =&gt; response.</span><span><span class="hljs-title function_">text</span></span><span>())
        .</span><span><span class="hljs-title function_">then</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-params">msg</span></span></span><span> =&gt; </span><span><span class="hljs-variable language_">document</span></span><span>.</span><span><span class="hljs-title function_">getElementById</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">'syncStatus'</span></span><span>).</span><span><span class="hljs-property">innerText</span></span><span> = msg)
        .</span><span><span class="hljs-title function_">catch</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-params">err</span></span></span><span> =&gt; </span><span><span class="hljs-variable language_">document</span></span><span>.</span><span><span class="hljs-title function_">getElementById</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">'syncStatus'</span></span><span>).</span><span><span class="hljs-property">innerText</span></span><span> = </span><span><span class="hljs-string">'Sync failed: '</span></span><span> + err);
    }
  </span><span><span class="hljs-tag">&lt;/<span class="hljs-name">script</span></span></span><span>&gt;
</span><span><span class="hljs-tag">&lt;/<span class="hljs-name">body</span></span></span><span>&gt;
</span><span><span class="hljs-tag">&lt;/<span class="hljs-name">html</span></span></span><span>&gt;
</span></span></code></div></div></pre>
<hr data-start="3392" data-end="3395">
<p data-start="3397" data-end="3407">These now:</p>
<ul data-start="3408" data-end="3612">
<li data-start="3408" data-end="3469">
<p data-start="3410" data-end="3469">Include a proper <code data-start="3427" data-end="3444">&lt;meta viewport&gt;</code> so they scale on phones.</p>
</li>
<li data-start="3470" data-end="3507">
<p data-start="3472" data-end="3507">Use bigger tap targets for buttons.</p>
</li>
<li data-start="3508" data-end="3558">
<p data-start="3510" data-end="3558">Stack the header/footer nicely on small screens.</p>
</li>
<li data-start="3559" data-end="3612">
<p data-start="3561" data-end="3612">Make primary actions full-width on narrow displays.</p>
</li>
</ul>
<p data-start="3614" data-end="3864" data-is-last-node="" data-is-only-node="">If you want, I can also give you a <strong data-start="3649" data-end="3665">success.html</strong> that is mobile-friendly so the “Payment successfully saved” + “Scan next” buttons are big and thumb-friendly. That’s the next screen your FSP users will see repeatedly. </span><span><span class="hljs-tag">&lt;<span class="hljs-name">style</span></span></span><span>&gt;<span class="language-css">
  </span></span><span><span class="hljs-comment">/* Keep desktop styles as you have them. These are just helpers. */</span></span><span>
  </span><span><span class="hljs-selector-tag">body</span></span><span> { -webkit-text-size-adjust: </span><span><span class="hljs-number">100%</span></span><span>; }

  </span><span><span class="hljs-comment">/* Images scale down on phones, stay crisp on desktop */</span></span><span>
  </span><span><span class="hljs-selector-tag">img</span></span><span> { </span><span><span class="hljs-attribute">max-width</span></span><span>: </span><span><span class="hljs-number">100%</span></span><span>; </span><span><span class="hljs-attribute">height</span></span><span>: auto; }

  </span><span><span class="hljs-comment">/* Comfortable tap targets everywhere */</span></span><span>
  </span><span><span class="hljs-selector-tag">button</span></span><span>, </span><span><span class="hljs-selector-tag">input</span></span><span>, select { </span><span><span class="hljs-attribute">font-size</span></span><span>: </span><span><span class="hljs-number">16px</span></span><span>; }      </span><span><span class="hljs-comment">/* avoids mobile zoom */</span></span><span>
  </span><span><span class="hljs-selector-tag">button</span></span><span> { </span><span><span class="hljs-attribute">min-height</span></span><span>: </span><span><span class="hljs-number">48px</span></span><span>; </span><span><span class="hljs-attribute">border-radius</span></span><span>: </span><span><span class="hljs-number">8px</span></span><span>; }

  </span><span><span class="hljs-comment">/* Mobile overrides only */</span></span><span>
  </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">@media</span></span><span> (</span><span><span class="hljs-attribute">max-width</span></span><span>: </span><span><span class="hljs-number">576px</span></span><span>) {
    </span><span><span class="hljs-comment">/* Stack busy headers instead of squeezing */</span></span><span>
    </span><span><span class="hljs-selector-tag">header</span></span><span> { </span><span><span class="hljs-attribute">display</span></span><span>: flex; </span><span><span class="hljs-attribute">flex-direction</span></span><span>: column; </span><span><span class="hljs-attribute">gap</span></span><span>: </span><span><span class="hljs-number">12px</span></span><span>; </span><span><span class="hljs-attribute">height</span></span><span>: auto; </span><span><span class="hljs-attribute">padding</span></span><span>: </span><span><span class="hljs-number">16px</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-meta">!important</span></span><span>; }

    </span><span><span class="hljs-comment">/* Side paddings so content isn’t edge-to-edge */</span></span><span>
    </span><span><span class="hljs-selector-tag">main</span></span><span> { </span><span><span class="hljs-attribute">padding</span></span><span>: </span><span><span class="hljs-number">16px</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-meta">!important</span></span><span>; }

    </span><span><span class="hljs-comment">/* Cards/sections breathe a bit on phones */</span></span><span>
    </span><span><span class="hljs-selector-class">.section</span></span><span>, </span><span><span class="hljs-selector-class">.sync-section</span></span><span>, </span><span><span class="hljs-selector-class">.message-box</span></span><span>, </span><span><span class="hljs-selector-class">.section-box</span></span><span>, </span><span><span class="hljs-selector-class">.login-box</span></span><span> { 
      </span><span><span class="hljs-attribute">margin</span></span><span>: </span><span><span class="hljs-number">0</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-number">0</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-number">24px</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-number">0</span></span><span>; 
      </span><span><span class="hljs-attribute">padding</span></span><span>: </span><span><span class="hljs-number">20px</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-meta">!important</span></span><span>; 
      </span><span><span class="hljs-attribute">width</span></span><span>: </span><span><span class="hljs-number">100%</span></span><span>; 
      </span><span><span class="hljs-attribute">max-width</span></span><span>: </span><span><span class="hljs-number">420px</span></span><span>;       </span><span><span class="hljs-comment">/* keeps it neat on bigger phones */</span></span><span>
      </span><span><span class="hljs-attribute">box-sizing</span></span><span>: border-box;
    }

    </span><span><span class="hljs-comment">/* Logos/banners scale down gracefully */</span></span><span>
    </span><span><span class="hljs-selector-class">.header-left</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-selector-tag">img</span></span><span> { </span><span><span class="hljs-attribute">height</span></span><span>: </span><span><span class="hljs-number">40px</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-meta">!important</span></span><span>; }
    </span><span><span class="hljs-selector-class">.scandroid-banner</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-selector-tag">img</span></span><span> { </span><span><span class="hljs-attribute">max-height</span></span><span>: </span><span><span class="hljs-number">80px</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-meta">!important</span></span><span>; </span><span><span class="hljs-attribute">max-width</span></span><span>: </span><span><span class="hljs-number">80%</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-meta">!important</span></span><span>; }

    </span><span><span class="hljs-comment">/* Buttons typically full-width on phones */</span></span><span>
    </span><span><span class="hljs-selector-class">.btn-primary</span></span><span>, </span><span><span class="hljs-selector-id">#syncBtn</span></span><span>, </span><span><span class="hljs-selector-class">.login-box</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-selector-tag">button</span></span><span>, </span><span><span class="hljs-selector-class">.message-box</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-selector-tag">a</span></span><span> { </span><span><span class="hljs-attribute">width</span></span><span>: </span><span><span class="hljs-number">100%</span></span><span>; }

    </span><span><span class="hljs-comment">/* Footers shouldn’t be fixed on tiny screens */</span></span><span>
    </span><span><span class="hljs-selector-tag">footer</span></span><span> { 
      </span><span><span class="hljs-attribute">position</span></span><span>: static </span><span><span class="hljs-meta">!important</span></span><span>; 
      </span><span><span class="hljs-attribute">padding</span></span><span>: </span><span><span class="hljs-number">12px</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-number">16px</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-meta">!important</span></span><span>; 
      </span><span><span class="hljs-attribute">display</span></span><span>: flex; 
      </span><span><span class="hljs-attribute">flex-direction</span></span><span>: column; 
      </span><span><span class="hljs-attribute">gap</span></span><span>: </span><span><span class="hljs-number">6px</span></span><span>; 
      </span><span><span class="hljs-attribute">text-align</span></span><span>: center; 
    }
  }
</span><span><span class="hljs-tag">&lt;/<span class="hljs-name">style</span></span></span><span>&gt;
</span></span></code></div></div></pre>
<p data-start="2026" data-end="2040">How to use it:</p>
<ul data-start="2041" data-end="2258">
<li data-start="2041" data-end="2101">
<p data-start="2043" data-end="2101">Keep your current desktop look exactly as you designed it.</p>
</li>
<li data-start="2102" data-end="2158">
<p data-start="2104" data-end="2158">Add the <code data-start="2112" data-end="2120">&lt;meta&gt;</code> and the CSS block above to each page.</p>
</li>
<li data-start="2159" data-end="2258">
<p data-start="2161" data-end="2258">Test quickly with Chrome DevTools → Device Toolbar (toggle phone sizes) and on your actual phone.</p>
</li>
</ul>
<p data-start="2260" data-end="2454" data-is-last-node="" data-is-only-node="">This pattern preserves the desktop layout, then—only under ~576px wide—makes headers stack, buttons full-width, logos smaller, and footers non-sticky. Clean, predictable, and no redesign needed.</p></div></div></div></div><div class="flex min-h-[46px] justify-start"><div class="touch:-me-2 touch:-ms-3.5 -ms-2.5 -me-1 flex flex-wrap items-center     </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">@media</span></span><span> (</span><span><span class="hljs-attribute">max-width</span></span><span>: </span><span><span class="hljs-number">576px</span></span><span>) {
      </span><span><span class="hljs-selector-class">.branding</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-selector-tag">img</span></span><span> {
        </span><span><span class="hljs-attribute">max-width</span></span><span>: </span><span><span class="hljs-number">80%</span></span><span>;
        </span><span><span class="hljs-comment">/* optional: uncomment to limit tall logos on phones */</span></span><span>
        </span><span><span class="hljs-comment">/* max-height: 160px; */</span></span><span>
      }
      </span><span><span class="hljs-selector-class">.login-box</span></span><span> {
        </span><span><span class="hljs-attribute">padding</span></span><span>: </span><span><span class="hljs-number">24px</span></span><span>;
      }
      </span><span><span class="hljs-selector-tag">footer</span></span><span> {
        </span><span><span class="hljs-attribute">flex-direction</span></span><span>: column;
        </span><span><span class="hljs-attribute">align-items</span></span><span>: center;
        </span><span><span class="hljs-attribute">text-align</span></span><span>: center;
        </span><span><span class="hljs-attribute">padding</span></span><span>: </span><span><span class="hljs-number">12px</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-number">16px</span></span><span>;
      }
    }
  </span><span><span class="hljs-tag">&lt;/<span class="hljs-name">style</span></span></span><span>&gt;

  </span><span><span class="hljs-tag">&lt;<span class="hljs-name">div</span></span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-attr">class</span></span><span>=</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"page-wrapper"</span></span><span>&gt;
    </span><span><span class="hljs-tag">&lt;<span class="hljs-name">div</span></span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-attr">class</span></span><span>=</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"branding"</span></span><span>&gt;
      </span><span><span class="hljs-tag">&lt;<span class="hljs-name">img</span></span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-attr">src</span></span><span>=</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"{{ url_for('static', filename='scandroid.png') }}"</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-attr">alt</span></span><span>=</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"Scandroid Logo"</span></span><span>&gt;
    </span><span><span class="hljs-tag">&lt;/<span class="hljs-name">div</span></span></span><span>&gt;

    </span><span><span class="hljs-tag">&lt;<span class="hljs-name">div</span></span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-attr">class</span></span><span>=</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"login-box"</span></span><span>&gt;
      </span><span><span class="hljs-tag">&lt;<span class="hljs-name">h2</span></span></span><span>&gt;FSP Admin Login</span><span><span class="hljs-tag">&lt;/<span class="hljs-name">h2</span></span></span><span>&gt;

      {% if error %}
        </span><span><span class="hljs-tag">&lt;<span class="hljs-name">div</span></span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-attr">class</span></span><span>=</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"error"</span></span><span>&gt;{{ error }}</span><span><span class="hljs-tag">&lt;/<span class="hljs-name">div</span></span></span><span>&gt;
      {% endif %}

      </span><span><span class="hljs-tag">&lt;<span class="hljs-name">form</span></span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-attr">method</span></span><span>=</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"post"</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-attr">action</span></span><span>=</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"/fsp-login"</span></span><span>&gt;
        </span><span><span class="hljs-tag">&lt;<span class="hljs-name">input</span></span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-attr">type</span></span><span>=</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"text"</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-attr">name</span></span><span>=</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"username"</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-attr">placeholder</span></span><span>=</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"Username"</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-attr">required</span></span><span>&gt;
        </span><span><span class="hljs-tag">&lt;<span class="hljs-name">input</span></span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-attr">type</span></span><span>=</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"password"</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-attr">name</span></span><span>=</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"password"</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-attr">placeholder</span></span><span>=</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"Password"</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-attr">required</span></span><span>&gt;

  </span><span><span class="hljs-tag">&lt;<span class="hljs-name">footer</span></span></span><span>&gt;
    </span><span><span class="hljs-tag">&lt;<span class="hljs-name">div</span></span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-attr">class</span></span><span>=</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"footer-left"</span></span><span>&gt;Developed by 510 @ The Netherlands Red Cross</span><span><span class="hljs-tag">&lt;/<span class="hljs-name">div</span></span></span><span>&gt;
    </span><span><span class="hljs-tag">&lt;<span class="hljs-name">div</span></span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-attr">class</span></span><span>=</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"footer-right"</span></span><span>&gt;If you need support contact jharrison@redcross.nl</span><span><span class="hljs-tag">&lt;/<span class="hljs-name">div</span></span></span><span>&gt;

</span></span></code></div></div></pre>

@[34rem]:[--thread-content-max-width:40rem] @[64rem]:[--thread-content-max-width:48rem] mx-auto max-w-(--thread-content-max-width) flex-1 group/turn-messages focus-visible:outline-hidden relative flex flex-col gap-1 empty:hidden first:pt-[3px]"><div class="markdown prose dark:prose-invert w-full break-words light markdown-new-styling"><p data-start="0" data-end="93">Right now your <code data-start="15" data-end="30">.branding img</code> is fixed at <code data-start="43" data-end="58">height: 300px</code>, so it’s always huge on desktop.</p>
<p data-start="95" data-end="196">We can make it <strong data-start="110" data-end="129">scale naturally</strong> — big enough on desktop, smaller on phones — without blowing up.</p>

      </span><span><span class="hljs-attribute">display</span></span><span>: flex;
      </span><span><span class="hljs-attribute">justify-content</span></span><span>: space-between;
      </span><span><span class="hljs-attribute">gap</span></span><span>: </span><span><span class="hljs-number">8px</span></span><span>;

      </span><span><span class="hljs-attribute">box-sizing</span></span><span>: border-box;
    }

    </span><span><span class="hljs-comment">/* Mobile tweaks */</span></span><span>
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">@media</span></span><span> (</span><span><span class="hljs-attribute">max-width</span></span><span>: </span><span><span class="hljs-number">576px</span></span><span>) {
      </span><span><span class="hljs-selector-class">.branding</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-selector-tag">img</span></span><span> {
        </span><span><span class="hljs-attribute">max-width</span></span><span>: </span><span><span class="hljs-number">200px</span></span><span>; </span><span><span class="hljs-comment">/* smaller on phones */</span></span><span>
      }
      </span><span><span class="hljs-selector-class">.login-box</span></span><span> {
        </span><span><span class="hljs-attribute">padding</span></span><span>: </span><span><span class="hljs-number">24px</span></span><span>;
      }
      </span><span><span class="hljs-selector-tag">footer</span></span><span> {
        </span><span><span class="hljs-attribute">flex-direction</span></span><span>: column;

  </span><span><span class="hljs-tag">&lt;/<span class="hljs-name">style</span></span></span><span>&gt;

    </span><span><span class="hljs-tag">&lt;<span class="hljs-name">div</span></span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-attr">class</span></span><span>=</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"branding"</span></span><span>&gt;
      </span><span><span class="hljs-tag">&lt;<span class="hljs-name">img</span></span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-attr">src</span></span><span>=</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"{{ url_for('static', filename='scandroid.png') }}"</span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-attr">alt</span></span><span>=</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"Scandroid Logo"</span></span><span>&gt;

      </span><span><span class="hljs-tag">&lt;<span class="hljs-name">h2</span></span></span><span>&gt;FSP Admin Login</span><span><span class="hljs-tag">&lt;/<span class="hljs-name">h2</span></span></span><span>&gt;

      {% if error %}
        </span><span><span class="hljs-tag">&lt;<span class="hljs-name">div</span></span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-attr">class</span></span><span>=</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"error"</span></span><span>&gt;{{ error }}</span><span><span class="hljs-tag">&lt;/<span class="hljs-name">div</span></span></span><span>&gt;

    </span><span><span class="hljs-tag">&lt;<span class="hljs-name">div</span></span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-attr">class</span></span><span>=</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"footer-left"</span></span><span>&gt;Developed by 510 @ The Netherlands Red Cross</span><span><span class="hljs-tag">&lt;/<span class="hljs-name">div</span></span></span><span>&gt;
    </span><span><span class="hljs-tag">&lt;<span class="hljs-name">div</span></span></span><span> </span><span><span class="hljs-attr">class</span></span><span>=</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"footer-right"</span></span><span>&gt;If you need support contact jharrison@redcross.nl</span><span><span class="hljs-tag">&lt;/<span class="hljs-name">div</span></span></span><span>&gt;

</span></span></code></div></div></pre>
<p data-start="3477" data-end="3494"><strong data-start="3477" data-end="3494">Changes made:</strong></p>
<ul data-start="3495" data-end="3705">
<li data-start="3495" data-end="3527">
<p data-start="3497" data-end="3527">Removed fixed <code data-start="3511" data-end="3526">height: 300px</code>.</p>
</li>
<li data-start="3528" data-end="3566">
<p data-start="3530" data-end="3566">Added <code data-start="3536" data-end="3554">max-width: 300px</code> on desktop.</p>
</li>
<li data-start="3567" data-end="3642">
<p data-start="3569" data-end="3642">On phones (<code data-start="3580" data-end="3598">max-width: 576px</code>), it shrinks further to <code data-start="3623" data-end="3641">max-width: 200px</code>.</p>
</li>
<li data-start="3643" data-end="3705">
<p data-start="3645" data-end="3705">Always keeps aspect ratio with <code data-start="3676" data-end="3704">width: 100%; height: auto;</code>.</p>
</li>
</ul>

      display: flex;
      align-items: center;
      gap: 10px;
    }

      flex-grow: 1;

      text-align: center;
    }

    &lt;button id="syncBtn"&gt;{{ t.sync_latest or "Sync Latest Records" }}&lt;/button&gt;
    &lt;div id="statusMessage"&gt;{{ t.sync_initial or "Click sync to see how many beneficiaries are ready for offline validation." }}&lt;/div&gt;

&lt;script&gt;
  document.getElementById("syncBtn").addEventListener("click", function () {
    const btn = this;
    const statusDiv = document.getElementById("statusMessage");
    btn.disabled = true;
    btn.innerText = "{{ t.syncing or 'Syncing...' }}";

    fetch("/sync-fsp?lang={{ lang }}")
      .then(response =&gt; response.json())
      .then(data =&gt; {
        if (data.success) {
          statusDiv.textContent = data.message;
        } else {
          statusDiv.textContent = data.message;
        }
        btn.disabled = false;
        btn.innerText = "{{ t.sync_latest or 'Sync Latest Records' }}";
      })
      .catch(err =&gt; {
        statusDiv.textContent = "{{ t.sync_error or '❌ Failed to sync. Please try again.' }}";
        btn.disabled = false;
        btn.innerText = "{{ t.sync_latest or 'Sync Latest Records' }}";
      });
  });
&lt;/script&gt;

  </span></span><span><span class="hljs-variable language_">document</span></span><span>.</span><span><span class="hljs-title function_">getElementById</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"syncBtn"</span></span><span>).</span><span><span class="hljs-title function_">addEventListener</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"click"</span></span><span>, </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">function</span></span><span> (</span><span><span class="hljs-params"></span></span><span>) {
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">const</span></span><span> btn = </span><span><span class="hljs-variable language_">this</span></span><span>;
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">const</span></span><span> statusDiv = </span><span><span class="hljs-variable language_">document</span></span><span>.</span><span><span class="hljs-title function_">getElementById</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"statusMessage"</span></span><span>);
