    </span><span><span class="hljs-title function_">fetch</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"/sync-fsp?lang={{ lang }}"</span></span><span>)
      .</span><span><span class="hljs-title function_">then</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-params">response</span></span></span><span> =&gt; response.</span><span><span class="hljs-title function_">json</span></span><span>())
      .</span><span><span class="hljs-title function_">then</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-params">data</span></span></span><span> =&gt; {
        statusDiv.</span><span><span class="hljs-property">textContent</span></span><span> = data.</span><span><span class="hljs-property">message</span></span><span>;
        btn.</span><span><span class="hljs-property">disabled</span></span><span> = </span><span><span class="hljs-literal">false</span></span><span>;
        btn.</span><span><span class="hljs-property">innerText</span></span><span> = </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"{{ t.sync_latest or 'Sync Latest Records' }}"</span></span><span>;
      })
      .</span><span><span class="hljs-title function_">catch</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-params">err</span></span></span><span> =&gt; {
        statusDiv.</span><span><span class="hljs-property">textContent</span></span><span> = </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"{{ t.sync_error or '❌ Failed to sync. Please try again.' }}"</span></span><span>;
        btn.</span><span><span class="hljs-property">disabled</span></span><span> = </span><span><span class="hljs-literal">false</span></span><span>;
        btn.</span><span><span class="hljs-property">innerText</span></span><span> = </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"{{ t.sync_latest or 'Sync Latest Records' }}"</span></span><span>;
      });
  });
</span><span><span class="hljs-tag">&lt;/<span class="hljs-name">script</span></span></span><span>&gt;

</span><span><span class="hljs-tag">&lt;/<span class="hljs-name">body</span></span></span><span>&gt;
</span><span><span class="hljs-tag">&lt;/<span class="hljs-name">html</span></span></span><span>&gt;

data-start="23" data-end="46">.scandroid-banner img</code> in the CSS is set to <code data-start="68" data-end="83">height: 160px</code>, which is why it’s towering over everything.<br data-start="128" data-end="131">
If we drop that to something like <code data-start="165" data-end="172">100px</code> (desktop) and <code data-start="187" data-end="193">70px</code> (mobile), it’ll look balanced with the other header elements.</p>

<p data-start="5563" data-end="5684">This keeps the desktop logo more balanced with the header height and makes it proportionally smaller on mobile screens.</p>

flex-col gap-1 empty:hidden first:pt-[3px]"><div class="markdown prose dark:prose-invert w-full break-words light markdown-new-styling"><p data-start="0" data-end="164">Got it — right now, the mobile CSS is stacking <code data-start="47" data-end="61">.header-left</code> (NS logos) and <code data-start="77" data-end="96">.scandroid-banner</code> vertically.<br data-start="108" data-end="111">
We can make them stay in a single row on mobile by:</p>
<ul data-start="166" data-end="390">
<li data-start="166" data-end="245">
<p data-start="168" data-end="245">Keeping the <code data-start="180" data-end="201">flex-direction: row</code> for header children even at small widths.</p>
</li>
<li data-start="246" data-end="334">
<p data-start="248" data-end="334">Using <code data-start="254" data-end="271">flex-wrap: wrap</code> so if it <em data-start="281" data-end="289">really</em> can’t fit (tiny screen), they wrap nicely.</p>
</li>
<li data-start="335" data-end="390">
<p data-start="337" data-end="390">Shrinking images proportionally to fit in one line.</p>
</li>
</ul>
<p data-start="392" data-end="450">Here’s the adjusted CSS snippet for your FSP Admin page:</p>

</span><span><span class="hljs-tag">&lt;<span class="hljs-name">script</span></span></span><span>&gt;<span class="language-javascript">
  </span></span><span><span class="hljs-variable language_">document</span></span><span>.</span><span><span class="hljs-title function_">getElementById</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"syncBtn"</span></span><span>).</span><span><span class="hljs-title function_">addEventListener</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"click"</span></span><span>, </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">function</span></span><span> (</span><span><span class="hljs-params"></span></span><span>) {
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">const</span></span><span> btn = </span><span><span class="hljs-variable language_">this</span></span><span>;
    </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">const</span></span><span> statusDiv = </span><span><span class="hljs-variable language_">document</span></span><span>.</span><span><span class="hljs-title function_">getElementById</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"statusMessage"</span></span><span>);
    btn.</span><span><span class="hljs-property">disabled</span></span><span> = </span><span><span class="hljs-literal">true</span></span><span>;
    btn.</span><span><span class="hljs-property">innerText</span></span><span> = </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"{{ t.syncing or 'Syncing...' }}"</span></span><span>;

    </span><span><span class="hljs-title function_">fetch</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-string">"/sync-fsp?lang={{ lang }}"</span></span><span>)
      .</span><span><span class="hljs-title function_">then</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-params">response</span></span></span><span> =&gt; response.</span><span><span class="hljs-title function_">json</span></span><span>())
      .</span><span><span class="hljs-title function_">then</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-params">data</span></span></span><span> =&gt; {
        </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">if</span></span><span> (data.</span><span><span class="hljs-property">success</span></span><span>) {
          statusDiv.</span><span><span class="hljs-property">textContent</span></span><span> = data.</span><span><span class="hljs-property">message</span></span><span>;
        } </span><span><span class="hljs-keyword">else</span></span><span> {
          statusDiv.</span><span><span class="hljs-property">textContent</span></span><span> = data.</span><span><span class="hljs-property">message</span></span><span>;
        }
        btn.</span><span><span class="hljs-property">disabled</span></span><span> = </span><span><span class="hljs-literal">false</span></span><span>;
        btn.</span><span><span class="hljs-property">innerText</span></span><span> = </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"{{ t.sync_latest or 'Sync Latest Records' }}"</span></span><span>;
      })
      .</span><span><span class="hljs-title function_">catch</span></span><span>(</span><span><span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-params">err</span></span></span><span> =&gt; {
        statusDiv.</span><span><span class="hljs-property">textContent</span></span><span> = </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"{{ t.sync_error or '❌ Failed to sync. Please try again.' }}"</span></span><span>;
        btn.</span><span><span class="hljs-property">disabled</span></span><span> = </span><span><span class="hljs-literal">false</span></span><span>;
        btn.</span><span><span class="hljs-property">innerText</span></span><span> = </span><span><span class="hljs-string">"{{ t.sync_latest or 'Sync Latest Records' }}"</span></span><span>;
      });
  });
</span><span><span class="hljs-tag">&lt;/<span class="hljs-name">script</span></span></span><span>&gt;

</span></span></code></div></div></pre>
<p data-start="5427" data-end="5439">This will:</p>
<ul data-start="5440" data-end="5628">
<li data-start="5440" data-end="5504">
<p data-start="5442" data-end="5504">Keep NS logos and Scandroid banner in <strong data-start="5480" data-end="5501">one row on mobile</strong>.</p>
</li>
<li data-start="5505" data-end="5589">
<p data-start="5507" data-end="5589">Scale down logos and banner proportionally so the header height is much smaller.</p>
</li>
<li data-start="5590" data-end="5628">
<p data-start="5592" data-end="5628">Keep the desktop layout untouched.</p>
</li>
</ul>

markdown-new-styling"><p data-start="0" data-end="96">Here’s a clear record so you can pick this up later without re-reading the whole conversation.</p>
<hr data-start="98" data-end="101">
<h2 data-start="103" data-end="137"><strong data-start="106" data-end="137">Idealised FSP User Workflow</strong></h2>
<ol data-start="138" data-end="1543">
<li data-start="138" data-end="263">
<p data-start="141" data-end="159"><strong data-start="141" data-end="157">Open the App</strong></p>
<ul data-start="163" data-end="263">
<li data-start="163" data-end="220">
<p data-start="165" data-end="220">On Android tablet/phone via a saved home screen icon.</p>
</li>
<li data-start="224" data-end="263">
<p data-start="226" data-end="263">App works offline after first load.</p>
</li>
</ul>
</li>
<li data-start="265" data-end="349">
<p data-start="268" data-end="291"><strong data-start="268" data-end="289">Login (FSP Staff)</strong></p>
<ul data-start="295" data-end="349">
<li data-start="295" data-end="349">
<p data-start="297" data-end="349">Enter username/password on the <strong data-start="328" data-end="341">FSP Login</strong> page.</p>
</li>
</ul>
</li>
<li data-start="351" data-end="545">
<p data-start="354" data-end="380"><strong data-start="354" data-end="378">Go to FSP Admin Page</strong></p>
<ul data-start="384" data-end="545">
<li data-start="384" data-end="545">
<p data-start="386" data-end="416">See a simple dashboard with:</p>
<ul data-start="422" data-end="545">
<li data-start="422" data-end="455">
<p data-start="424" data-end="455">“Sync Latest Records” button.</p>
</li>
<li data-start="461" data-end="545">
<p data-start="463" data-end="545">Status message showing how many beneficiaries are cached for offline validation.</p>
</li>
</ul>
</li>
</ul>
</li>
<li data-start="547" data-end="714">
<p data-start="550" data-end="574"><strong data-start="550" data-end="572">Sync Beneficiaries</strong></p>
<ul data-start="578" data-end="714">
<li data-start="578" data-end="628">
<p data-start="580" data-end="628">Tap “Sync Latest Records” (requires internet).</p>
</li>
<li data-start="632" data-end="714">
<p data-start="634" data-end="714">Beneficiaries for offline use are cached with encryption for sensitive fields.</p>
</li>
</ul>
</li>
<li data-start="716" data-end="830">
<p data-start="719" data-end="753"><strong data-start="719" data-end="751">Start Scanning Beneficiaries</strong></p>
<ul data-start="757" data-end="830">
<li data-start="757" data-end="789">
<p data-start="759" data-end="789">Press “Scan QR Code” button.</p>
</li>
<li data-start="793" data-end="830">
<p data-start="795" data-end="830">Camera opens, QR code is scanned.</p>
</li>
</ul>
</li>
<li data-start="832" data-end="952">
<p data-start="835" data-end="865"><strong data-start="835" data-end="863">Beneficiary Page Appears</strong></p>
<ul data-start="869" data-end="952">
<li data-start="869" data-end="909">
<p data-start="871" data-end="909">Shows beneficiary details and photo.</p>
</li>
<li data-start="913" data-end="952">
<p data-start="915" data-end="952">Approve / Reject buttons available.</p>
</li>
</ul>
</li>
<li data-start="954" data-end="1138">
<p data-start="957" data-end="982"><strong data-start="957" data-end="980">Mark Payment Status</strong></p>
<ul data-start="986" data-end="1138">
<li data-start="986" data-end="1043">
<p data-start="988" data-end="1043">Approve or Reject sets the status in the local cache.</p>
</li>
<li data-start="1047" data-end="1138">
<p data-start="1049" data-end="1138">If the same beneficiary is scanned again, the latest status <strong data-start="1109" data-end="1123">overwrites</strong> the old one.</p>
</li>
</ul>
</li>
<li data-start="1140" data-end="1271">
<p data-start="1143" data-end="1168"><strong data-start="1143" data-end="1166">Confirmation Screen</strong></p>
<ul data-start="1172" data-end="1271">
<li data-start="1172" data-end="1229">
<p data-start="1174" data-end="1229">Shows “Payment successfully saved” (not “submitted”).</p>
</li>
<li data-start="1233" data-end="1271">
<p data-start="1235" data-end="1271">Button to “Scan Next Beneficiary.”</p>
</li>
</ul>
</li>
<li data-start="1273" data-end="1364">
<p data-start="1276" data-end="1297"><strong data-start="1276" data-end="1295">Repeat Scanning</strong></p>
<ul data-start="1301" data-end="1364">
<li data-start="1301" data-end="1364">
<p data-start="1303" data-end="1364">Continue until all beneficiaries are processed for the day.</p>
</li>
</ul>
</li>
<li data-start="1366" data-end="1543">
<p data-start="1370" data-end="1394"><strong data-start="1370" data-end="1392">Submit Data to 121</strong></p>
<ul data-start="1399" data-end="1543">
<li data-start="1399" data-end="1442">
<p data-start="1401" data-end="1442">When back online, go to FSP Admin page.</p>
</li>
<li data-start="1447" data-end="1496">
<p data-start="1449" data-end="1496">See count of beneficiaries “ready to submit.”</p>
</li>
<li data-start="1501" data-end="1543">
<p data-start="1503" data-end="1543">Tap “Push” to send all records to 121.</p>
</li>
</ul>
</li>
</ol>
<hr data-start="1545" data-end="1548">
<h2 data-start="1550" data-end="1567"><strong data-start="1553" data-end="1567">Next Steps</strong></h2>
<h3 data-start="1568" data-end="1589"><strong data-start="1572" data-end="1589">Functionality</strong></h3>
<ul class="contains-task-list" data-start="1590" data-end="1923">
<li class="task-list-item" data-start="1590" data-end="1637">
<p data-start="1596" data-end="1637"><input disabled="" type="checkbox"> Add <strong data-start="1600" data-end="1618">QR scan button</strong> to FSP Admin page.</p>
</li>

<p data-start="1644" data-end="1720"><input disabled="" type="checkbox"> Add <strong data-start="1648" data-end="1714">scan → beneficiary → approve/reject → confirmation → scan next</strong> flow.</p>
</li>
<li class="task-list-item" data-start="1721" data-end="1783">
<p data-start="1727" data-end="1783"><input disabled="" type="checkbox"> Implement <strong data-start="1737" data-end="1760">overwrite on rescan</strong> logic for local cache.</p>
</li>
<li class="task-list-item" data-start="1784" data-end="1846">

<li class="task-list-item" data-start="1847" data-end="1923">

</li>
</ul>
<h3 data-start="1925" data-end="1958"><strong data-start="1929" data-end="1958">Offline &amp; Data Protection</strong></h3>
<ul class="contains-task-list" data-start="1959" data-end="2233">
<li class="task-list-item" data-start="1959" data-end="2047">
<p data-start="1965" data-end="2047"><input disabled="" type="checkbox"> Confirm all offline data uses <strong data-start="1995" data-end="2025">encrypted sensitive fields</strong> (names, phone, etc.).</p>
</li>
<li class="task-list-item" data-start="2048" data-end="2149">
<p data-start="2054" data-end="2149"><input disabled="" type="checkbox"> Ensure offline cache only stores <strong data-start="2087" data-end="2122">fields in <code data-start="2099" data-end="2120">config_display.json</code></strong> plus needed status fields.</p>
</li>
<li class="task-list-item" data-start="2150" data-end="2233">
<p data-start="2156" data-end="2233"><input disabled="" type="checkbox"> Add Service Worker for <strong data-start="2179" data-end="2194">PWA support</strong> so app works offline after first load.</p>
</li>
</ul>
<h3 data-start="2235" data-end="2262"><strong data-start="2239" data-end="2262">Mobile Optimisation</strong></h3>

</li>
<li data-start="2414" data-end="2480" class="task-list-item">
<p data-start="2420" data-end="2480"><input disabled="" type="checkbox"> Ensure <strong data-start="2427" data-end="2438">buttons</strong> are touch-friendly with larger tap areas.</p>
</li>

</ul>
<h3 data-start="2545" data-end="2560"><strong data-start="2549" data-end="2560">Testing</strong></h3>
<ul class="contains-task-list" data-start="2561" data-end="2773">

<hr data-start="2775" data-end="2778">
<p data-start="2780" data-end="3022" data-is-last-node="" data-is-only-node="">If you want, I can prep the <strong data-start="2808" data-end="2846">PWA + offline service worker setup</strong> next, since that’s the backbone for offline + home-screen icon usage.
